name: Tomb Raider I
description:
This script will install "Tomb Raider I" GOG edition with strong graphics improvements and support for modern computer configuration.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses different projects:
GLRage: https://github.com/ata4/glrage
TombATI: http://www.glidos.net/tombati.html
HD textures packs: http://www.tombraiderxtra.com/
other sources: https://www.tombraiderforums.com
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
*Read me*
- When the "Tomb Raider Importer" dialog box will appear, just click "install". 
- Bonus: Gold extension and HD textures packs.
*Known issue*
- TR1 has insufficient controller support, I invite you to use a keymapper. You will find profiles for x360 (Antimicro) and Steam Controller (sc-controller) in the "gamepad profiles" folder.
- Please report issue concerning this script directly on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

files.setup: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG

task.description: When the "Tomb Raider Importer" will appear, just click "install".
task.name: wineexec

content:
custom-name: Tomb Raider I Gold - GOG
files:
- tombati:
    filename: TombATI_v1.7.rar
    url: http://download.glidos.net/TombATI/TombATI_v1.7.exe
- hdtextures:
    filename: TombATI_HD_Textures_v1.0.rar
    url: http://download.glidos.net/TombATI/TombATI_HD_Textures_v1.0.exe
- trpcx: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/TITLEH.zip
- menu1: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/TOMBATIM1.BAT
- menu2: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/TOMBATIM2.BAT
- gppx360: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_x360.gamecontroller.amgp
- gppsteam: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_steam.sccprofile
- gppreadme: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/gamepad%20profiles/tr1-2_gamepad_readme.html
- wpp: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Tomb%20Raider%20I/tr1.bmp
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- setup: N/A:Select the installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/TOMBATI/TOMBATIM1.BAT
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games" "$setup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    file: tombati
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/TR1HD/
    file: hdtextures
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    src: menu1
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/
    src: menu2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppx360
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppsteam
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/gamepad profiles/
    src: gppreadme
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ddraw
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: winmm
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DllOverrides\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: native,builtin
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: AppPath
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Core Design\Tomb Raider II\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: C:\\GOG Games\\Tomb Raider 1\\
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Tomb Raider 1
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/app
- task:
    description: When the "Tomb Raider Importer" will appear, just click "install".
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/TombRaiderImporter.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/DATA/
    src: trpcx
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/
    src: wpp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: wallpaper
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\tr1.bmp
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: ActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GradientActiveTitle
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 255 179 102
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/INSTALL.BAT
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/shortcutJS.bat
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/TOMBATI/vc_redist.x86.exe
- move:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/
wine:
  Desktop: true
